title: poker nights
desc:
Post 237
-everyone shows their hand, the player with the best scoring hand gets to remove all cards in that score
-scoring works like this
multicolored- min 6 cards all of different types
royal straight i.e  min 5 cards in ascending/descending order via numerical value +same suit,
straight- 5 cards in ascending/descending order via numerical value
flush-5 cards of the same type
mini royal straights=3-4  cards in ascending/descending order via numerical value+same suit
mini straights= 3-4 cards in ascending/descending order via numerical value
pair+ = 2-4  cards of the same type; with those of higher amount beating those of lower amounts
high card - wild  beats all other types

in the event of a tie, check to see what other scores a player can have.
